instructions.reason_for_call: You want to exchange the water bottle and the desk lamp. You want to exchange the water bottle to a bigger one, and the desk lamp to a brighter one (prefer AC adapter > battery > USB). When the agent asks for confirmation, suddenly change your mind and ask to only exchange the desk lamp.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
Hi there! I'm looking to exchange a couple of items I recently bought. I have a water bottle and a desk lamp that I'd like to swap for different versions.
